casebody.data:
Mayor, Etc., of New York, Respondent, v. Ehrsam, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. June 1, 1891.) Appeal from third district court.

Argued before Allen, P. J., and Bischoff and Pryor, JJ.

Jas. Murphy, for appellant. L. Hanneman, for respondent.

Ho opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
